titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd on the coronation day of K. Charles I March 27, 1644, in S. Mary's in Cambridge / by Bishop Brownrigg when he was vice-chancellor of the vniversity, for which he was cast into prison.
titleStmt.author: Brownrig, Ralph, 1592-1659.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
